definition: to be looking for one's teeth all over the floor/(fig.) to get beaten up badly/to beat the crap out of (sb)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change

sentences.english: In addition to vomit your face emerge spittle, you Mandehuaya play.
sentences.chinese: 除了吐你們滿臉滿身唾沫，還打得你們滿地找牙。

sentences.english: I could have beat the crap out of you.
